headline: SLB (NYSE:SLB) Valuation in Focus After Major Geothermal Partnership With Ormat Technologies
summary: SLB (NYSE:SLB) just took a meaningful step in expanding its clean energy footprint by announcing a strategic partnership with Ormat Technologies to accelerate enhanced geothermal systems. This move positions SLB to diversify further into renewable energy markets. See our latest analysis for SLB. SLB has been bustling with activity, from inking sizable EPC contracts to its latest push into geothermal energy through the Ormat partnership. While the new contracts reinforce its traditional...
